name: Aphrodite mermaids & Pirates of Atlantis Seven Seas Progressive SLOTS odyssey

description:
Lookin for treasure aye? well you've come to the right place. Adventure and the seven seas await you but I must warn you, you may find something more than gold can buy. The best multilevel slots adventure!

Features :
** 12 levels of non stop fun**

** Daily bonuses to be won!**

So don't hesitate, its free to play!
